title: Riot PLZ FOR GOD SAKE CAN I GET MY KEY

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
LEGIT BOUGHT THE HEXTECH SET AND DIDN'T GET THE KEY AT ALL CAN PLZ FOR THE LOVE OF GOD GET THE KEY I BEEN WAITING 3 DAYS NOW FOR A FUCKING RESPONSE I KNOW ITS NOT HARD CAUSE I SEE YOU ANWSERING OTHER DISCUSSION.
LEGIT THE CHEST DIDN'T EVEN COMBINED WITH THE OTHER CHEST IT BUGGED OUT AND DIDN'T EVNE GIVE ME MY KEY REEEEEEEE

replies.body: Sorry for the delay in response, things have been a bit hectic.  I did look into your account and see that you do seem to be missing a key.  I've added to your account, good luck!
